attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Council tax rises this year will leave a lot of residents out pocket, as the tax rises we get less and less for the money we pay.  The tax should be scrapped and replaced with a tax that is means-tested based on Earnings and income. As well as delivery of services in the area in which you live.

rejection.details: There are lots of petitions on this topic: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=council+tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
